question: 3 (a)
statement_html:
Consider the cumulative distribution function \(\displaystyle F(x)\) on \(\displaystyle 0 \leq x \leq 10\) shown below.

(a) Sketch the probability density function \(\displaystyle p(x)\).
statement_latex:
Consider the cumulative distribution function $\displaystyle F(x)$ on
$\displaystyle 0 \leq x \leq 10$ shown below.

statement_raw:
Consider the cumulative distribution function <math> \displaystyle F(x) </math> on <math> \displaystyle 0 \leq x \leq 10</math> shown below.

[[File:MATH103April2005Q3.jpg]]

(a) Sketch the probability density function <math> \displaystyle p(x)</math>.
